2. Deficiency of the fifth component of complement (C5): This is a specific disease or condition. The fifth component of complement is a part of the immune system that plays a role in the complement system, which helps to destroy foreign substances in the body. A deficiency in this component can impair the immune response and make individuals more susceptible to infections.
